ygData.subject: Re: Question - off topic
ygData.msgSnippet: ... You re obviously confused ... BS MANTLES go for 50pp - 70pp.  BS TUNICS don t start bidding until 200pp+. Mantles show up about once an hour, tunics about
ygData.messageBody:
--- kale usi <kaleusi@...> wrote:
>> I'm on the Bertoxx server and Bloodstained Tunics
>> are selling for 200pp and up.

> 200 P? Really? What part of the world are you on? I
> see them all the time at the Bazaar in Eastern
> Commons for 50P to 70P. I myself bought one for 60P.

You're obviously confused ... BS MANTLES go for 50pp -
70pp. BS TUNICS don't start bidding until 200pp+.
Mantles show up about once an hour, tunics about three
times a day.

===
:D
Dave's World
-No matter where you go, there you are-
"People will believe a lie either because they want to
believe it's true, or because they fear it is." Wizard's
First Rule, Sword of Truth, Terry Goodkind
